key_risks: Economic volatility in Egypt, including currency devaluation, high inflation, and fiscal deficits
Potential regulatory changes affecting banking operations and financial performance
Cybersecurity risks due to reliance on digital platforms
Intense competition from traditional banks and fintech players
Reputation risks from occasional customer complaints
social_issues: Customer complaints about service quality or fees
